AlphaRacks Autumn Sale – Shared cPanel Hosting, Reseller Hosting, & Linux VPS from $0.99/year – Los Angeles, CA

November 3, 2017 @ 10:00 am, by Matt Zelasko

Hello all! Julian from AlphaRacks sent in an exclusive special offer with plans based in Los Angeles. They’ve been featured on LowEndBox before and are known for providing various different types of services within the hosting space.

Services are provisioned on hostnodes featuring Dual Intel Xeon processors with 128GB RAM, 4 x 2TB HDD configured in hardware RAID10 with CacheVault. They are connected by 2 x 1Gbps uplinks.

All services include cPanel (Shared/Reseller) and SolusVM (VPS) as the control panel, 1 IPv4 and 20 IPv6, full root access, instant setup, and best effort DDoS mitigation by QuadraNet Vest.

 Payment methods accepted are: PayPal, Credit Cards (via 2Checkout), and Bitcoin. You can view their Terms of Service here.
 ## EXTRA BONUS ##
 ORDER ANY PLAN BELOW, BEFORE NOVEMBER 15 and have your bandwidth DOUBLED on any plan at no additional charge (please keep in mind some plans below already include unlimited bandwidth, and those will not be applicable as they are already unlimited). Please open a ticket and request this after your order.

Looking to host a simple website, forum, or blog? Shared hosting is the easiest and fastest way to get started! All shared hosting plans include the easy to use cPanel control panel, and our network is DDoS protected!

Reseller Hosting Plans
Reseller Hosting allows you to start selling web hosting with cPanel and WHM! Whether you are an aspiring web host looking to sell cPanel hosting, or if you are an existing business in another industry (such as web design or internet marketers) but looking to sell hosting to your customers as an additional stream of income, we have the solution and platform to provide you. The best part about it is you can design your own hosting packages and sell them to your customers at prices that YOU set.
All reseller accounts include access to AlphaRacks’ exclusive “Reseller Resources” portal, which includes all the tools you need to kick start your new hosting business (unlimited SSL certificates, free domain reseller, legal documents, pre-made website templates, knowledgebase articles to provide to your customers, and more).
Now’s your chance to introduce a new source of long-term & recurring income, with AlphaRacks Reseller Hosting!
